## Job.getState() method

Get current state. 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getState(): Promise<any>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

{<!-- -->string<!-- -->} Returns one of these values: 'completed', 'failed', 'delayed', 'active', 'waiting', 'waiting-children', 'unknown'.
